name: THE SKY IS FULL OF BOMBS
name_original: THE SKY IS FULL OF BOMBS
description:
THE SKY IS FULL OF BOMBS
Game made in 72h for ScoreSpace Jam #22 using Unity and LootLocker.
Shoot bombs before they destroy all the houses in your town.
Survive for as long as you can and fight for a top 5 placement in the leaderboard!
